amendment.description: To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the tax breaks for individuals with annual incomes in excess of $1,000,000.

action.text: Ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4641 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 62. Record Vote Number: 197.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4641.

Amendment SA 4641 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S7458-7462; text: CR S7459) To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the tax breaks for individuals with annual incomes in excess of $1,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4641 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 62. Record Vote Number: 197.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4641 proposed by Senator Dodd.
